attributes.action: Call a general election as there is no mandate to rule once Tony Blair steps down.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair won the last general election on the mandate that he would rule for the entire 3rd term. This is now not the case and once the new labour leader is found a general election should be called as soon as possible.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
